title: Profanity
body:
With the profanity filter off in the new client, I can see profanity in the client only.

But ingame, it's censored

replies.body:
There are some bugs with the Language Filter in the new client that our teams are still looking into that can cause the filter not to work properly or turn off/on properly. Some players are able to resolve this by swapping back over to the Legacy Client (from login) to disable the chat filter, which will sometimes get it working again, but this workaround doesn't work for everyone.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
